mapper.select: SELECT ENTRY_APPL_ID AS entryApplId , APPL_ID AS applId , YMD AS ymd , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(PLAN_SDATE,'YMDHIS') AS planSdate , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(PLAN_EDATE,'YMDHIS') AS planEdate , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(ENTRY_SDATE,'YMDHIS') AS entrySdate , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(ENTRY_EDATE,'YMDHIS') AS entryEdate , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(CHG_SDATE,'YMDHIS') AS chgSdate , F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(CHG_EDATE,'YMDHIS') AS chgEdate , REASON FROM WTM_ENTRY_APPL WHERE APPL_ID = #{applId}
